name: You have never seen Budapest like this before!
description: Take a plunge into what Budapest really is exciting for, behind the shiny tourist traps and souvenirs "Made in China". It is very easy to download a description of the mainstream monuments in Budapest or view a tour on line with all of them. Type Hungary in Google and you will get lots of pictures with them. But if you want to see the local taste of one of Europe's most beautiful capitals, to experience the narrow streets full of exciting attractions you never knew of, if you want to see one of the largest synagogues in the world (or the very largest by some people), the famous ruinous pubs of Budapest and one of the best "bellevue" points in the city then join me in this unforgettable tour!
